code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{ContextGlobal}from'./utils/global.context';import'../Styles/Card.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=_ref=>{let{name,username,id,showDeleteButton,onDelete}=_ref;const{state,dispatch}=useContext(ContextGlobal);const addFav=()=>{const favs=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('favs'))||[];const newFav={name,username,id};if(!favs.some(fav=>fav.id===id)){favs.push(newFav);localStorage.setItem('favs',JSON.stringify(favs));}};const handleDelete=()=>{onDelete(id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card ".concat(state.theme),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/dentist/".concat(id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/doctor.jpg",alt:"Doctorimg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:username})]}),showDeleteButton&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,className:"deleteButton",children:"Delete"}),!showDeleteButton&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addFav,className:"favButton",children:"Add fav"})]});};export default Card;
